title: Add Alt Text to every photo associated with every post on the site.
snippet:
Login to WordPress  admin for shefinds.com (we will give you a login)
There are 2 types of stories: Posts and Collections (slideshows)

For "Posts," > Add Media > Media Library > select Uploaded to this post
Select the image
Add the Alt Text to the Alt Text field (see attached) 
Update the post

For slideshows, Collections > select the story > scroll down the page to "Collections gallery images" > select the images > Add the Alt Text > Update the image (see attached)
Update the post

Here are some guidelines for what to put in the Alt Text: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nM0PDwP2zYoHDx7-NbeT_u6DoS97PpgRa2UrwdPm8LY/edit?usp=sharing

It should describe the image in plain english with some detail.

Please only do this on stories that have already been published, not drafts. 

Let me know if you have questions!
